meanings.sent1: The belaced shoes stayed snug on his feet.
meanings.sent2: She wore a belaced dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The belaced sneakers danced around the room on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her belaced heart was tightly bound with love.
meanings.sent5: The belaced corset held her posture perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The belaced curtains added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: He admired the belaced tablecloth at the fancy dinner.
meanings.sent3: The belaced cake looked too pretty to eat!
meanings.sent4: Her belaced hair was a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The belaced wedding gown sparkled under the lights.
